summary:
Character Presets made only for fun by me!

Use these presets ad you want but mention me (Sharper) if you show my characters in videos/web/etc.
descriptionHtml:
Hi i'm Sharper, an italian player of Skyrim. Today i'll show you my presets that i made in these years (i'll make other when i have time).
I havn't wrote the lores about my characters, so if you want, write them.
[center][b][i][u]
[color=#ffff00]Use these presets as you want but mention me (Sharper) if you show my characters in videos/web/etc.
You can't profit with these files.[/color][/u][/i][/b][color=#cc0000]
[/color][/center]
[center][s]Don't look at the weak quality of my skyrim because i haven't a good pc...
[/s](MUHUAHAHAHAHAH: NOW I HAVE A GTX 1070!)


[i][color=#ff0000][size=3][u]NEW! - New Images about my presets![/u][/size][/color][/i][/center]

[u][i][center][color=#00ff00]Endorse this projects, so i'll know if i have to continue to supporting them![/color][/center][/i][/u]

And sorry for my Renzi's english!

[i]P.S. I have coloured this text to reach its good-looking
[/i]
See Soon, maybe.


[color=#dbb0a7]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
[size=5][center]
[b][color=#3c78d8]Kyla[/color]
[/b]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/GcSQy3K.jpg[/img][/center][/size]  [img]http://i.imgur.com/LmQCZs1.jpg[/img]

[center][/center][size=3][color=#00ff00]How to install this preset ([u]required[/u]) :
[/color]
[/size]0) Download and install SKSE: [url=http://]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37576[/url]
1) Download and install Racemenu: [url=http://]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624[/url]
2) Download and install SKSE plugin (CharGen Core): [url=http://]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36925[/url]
3) Download and install Enhanced Character Edit: [url=http:]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951[/url]
4) Download and install WyldTats: [url=http://]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13970[/url]
5) Download and install THEHAGs Private Wartattoos: [url=http://]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41210[/url]
6) Download and install CBBE: [url=http://]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666[/url]
7) Download and install SG Textures Renewal (for CBBE): [url=http://]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267[/url]
8) Download and install ALSL Body - CBBE BBP TBBP HDT (similiar to HDT but better for me): [url=http://]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31926[/url]
[size=2]9) Download and install KS Hairdo's: [url=http://]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311[/url]
10) [color=orange]Link to banned user's mod has been removed[/color]
11) Download and install Cherry's Eyes: [url=http://]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60111[/url]
12) Download and install my preset (follow instructions in "readme" file contained in .rar file)

[color=#00ff00]Optional (for beauty or for fun):[/color]

1) Download and install Facelight: [url=http://]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457[/url]
2) Download and install HDT HighHeels System (and relative heels mods, if you want. Requires HDT Physics Extension): [url=http://]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213[/url]
3) Download and install Immersive First Person: [url=http://]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49036[/url]
4) Download and install HDT Tails wereable (this mod requires HDT Physics Extension): [url=http://]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58165[/url]

[/size][color=#dbb0a7]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[/color]

[size=5][center][b][color=#3c78d8]Braila[/color]
[/b][/center]
[center][/center] [img]http://i.imgur.com/M6vhsKf.jpg[/img]
 [img]http://i.imgur.com/xzKbieR.jpg[/img]

[/size][size=3][color=#00ff00]How to install this preset ([u]required[/u]) :[/color]

[/size]0) Download and install SKSE: [url=http:]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37576[/url]
1) Download and install Racemenu: [url=http:]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624[/url]

3) Download and install WyldTats: [url=http:]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13970[/url]

5) Download and install CBBE: [url=http:]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666[/url]
6) Download and install SG Textures Renewal (for CBBE): [url=http:]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267[/url]
7) Download and install ALSL Body - CBBE BBP TBBP HDT (similiar to HDT but better for me): [url=http:]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31926[/url]
8) Download and install The Eyes Of Beauty: [url=http://]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722[/url]
9) Download and install SG Female Eyebrows: [url=http://]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35327[/url]
10) Download and install SG Hair Pack 268 (install this pack manually with the option "Add mod from file" on Nexus Mod Manager): [url=http://]http://www.4shared.com/archive/ohHHxIxvba/SG_Hair_Pack_268.html[/url]
11) Download and install my preset (follow instructions in "readme" file contained in .rar file)

[color=#00ff00]Optional (for beauty or for fun):[/color]

1) Download and install Facelight: [url=http:]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457[/url]
2) Download and install HDT HighHeels System (and relative heels mods, if you want. Requires HDT Physics Extension): [url=http:]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213[/url]
3) Download and install Immersive First Person: [url=http:]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49036[/url]
4) Download and install HDT Tails wereable (this mod requires HDT Physics Extension): [url=http:]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58165[/url]

[/b][/size][/center]

[color=#00ff00]Optional (for beauty or for fun):[/color]

1) Download and install Facelight: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/uploadwizard/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457[/url]
2) Download and install HDT HighHeels System (and relative heels mods, if you want. Requires HDT Physics Extension): [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/uploadwizard/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213[/url]
3) Download and install Immersive First Person: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/uploadwizard/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49036[/url]
4) Download and install HDT Tails wereable (this mod requires HDT Physics Extension): [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/uploadwizard/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58165[/url]

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

For now there're only these presets, but in the future i'll add others: everything is gratis (in italian we say: "è tutto aggratis")



[center][i][color=#ff0000][u]If you found issues contact me or create a discussion and i'll search a solution.[/u][/color]

[/i][/center]
author: Sharper
